articles.title: Is dishonesty really contagious? - RNZ
articles.description: A recent study in Scientific American suggested that people tend to lie when they're in groups, especially when profit is concerned. Professor of Psychology Marc Wilson is with us to discuss whether dishonesty really is contagious.

articles.title: Iga Swiatek wins 35th consecutive match to claim 2nd French Open title - CBC Sports
articles.description: Top-ranked Iga Swiatek beat 18-year-old American Coco Gauff 6-1, 6-3 in the French Open women's final Saturday in Paris to collect her second title at Roland Garros and stretch her winning streak to 35 matches.
articles.content:
Iga Swiatek is so efficient, so smooth, with a racket in her hand, seemingly never flustered a bit and, for months now, never beaten.

articles.title: Poland's Iga Świątek thrashes American Coco Gauff to win second French Open title - ABC News
articles.description: World number one Iga Świątek continues her recent domination of women's tennis, beating Coco Gauff in straight sets to win her second major title.
articles.content:
